item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, September 13, 2024 at 5:15 PM UTC
item.description:

2. Porting SBCL to the Nintendo Switch (200 points | 35 comments)
3. Martin Luther King Jr. In Berlin (22 points | 2 comments)

6. Supabase (YC S20) Is Hiring Postgres SREs [Fully Remote] ( | hide)

29. Why Haskell? (385 points | 531 comments)
